sentences.english: The most extreme winds are now blowing 10 percent faster than they used to.
sentences.chinese: 現在最大的風速比過去增快了10%。

sentences.english: The Observatory explained that the average wind speed in Victoria Harbour did not reach storm force level.
sentences.chinese: 天文臺解釋，是維港港內普遍風速未達烈風程度。

sentences.english: Both light and temperature, with the addition of wind speed and other factors, can influence panel output.
sentences.chinese: 光和溫度，外加風速和其他因素都能影響面板的輸出。

sentences.english: Velocity module, incl. volume flow, degree of turbulence…
sentences.chinese: 風速模塊，包括風量，紊流度。

sentences.english: The hurricanes have sustained winds of 74mph and up.
sentences.chinese: 颶風維持時速74英里以上的風速。

sentences.english: Close to the ground, wind speed increases quickly with height.
sentences.chinese: 靠近地面，風速隨高度迅速增大。

sentences.english: And provide the theory instruction for designing other types anemometer .
sentences.chinese: 爲今後設計其它類型的風速計提供理論指導。

sentences.english: Wind speed and wind direction are important meteorological factors in ocean dynamic environment monitoring.
sentences.chinese: 海面風速風向是海洋動力環境監測的重要氣象要素。

sentences.english: If the windspeed is above 40 km ph at landing levels planes shouldn't land.
sentences.chinese: 地面上的風速超過40公里每小時，飛機就不該降落。

sentences.english: They were subject to violent yawing at low wind speeds.
sentences.chinese: 它們在低風速下會發生強烈的偏離。

sentences.english: The influence of fluidizing air of each chamber to the ash discharged rate of the bottom ash cooler;
sentences.chinese: 冷渣器各室的流化風速對排渣速率的影響較大。

sentences.english: The hurricane crossed the south-east corner of England with winds of up to 160 kph.
sentences.chinese: 颶風橫穿英格蘭東南角，風速高達每小時160公里。

sentences.english: Wind speed measurements shall be made with a cup classified anemometer.
sentences.chinese: 用已分好類別的杯狀風速計進行風速測量。

sentences.english: Wind speed measurements shall be made with a cup classified anemometer.
sentences.chinese: 用已分好類別的杯狀風速計進行風速測量。

sentences.english: The choice of sites depends on the wind, tidal currents and visibility .
sentences.chinese: 泊岸地的選擇取決於風速，浪潮的高低和能見度。

sentences.english: The islands reputedly experience the highest and most consistent wind speeds of any comparable place on earth.
sentences.chinese: 據說，這些島嶼是世界上風速最高最穩定的地方。
